# LINQ in C#

> Querying and transforming data using Language-Integrated Query syntax and method chains. LINQ provides compile-time type checking and IntelliSense for queries over collections, databases, and XML. Key methods include `Where`, `Select`, `OrderBy`, `GroupBy`, `Join`, and aggregate functions.

- [How to Build LINQ Queries based on run-time state](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/linq/how-to-build-dynamic-queries.md): Learn to query dynamically depending on run-time state, by varying either LINQ method calls or the expression trees passed into those methods.
- [Write your own extensions to LINQ](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/linq/how-to-extend-linq.md): Learn techniques to extend the standard LINQ methods. Query based on runtime state, modify query objects, and extend LINQ capabilities.
- [How to: use LINQ to query or modify collections](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/linq/how-to-query-collections.md): This series of examples shows you Language Integrated Query (LINQ) techniques to use with collections and arrays.
- [Use LINQ to query files and directories](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/linq/how-to-query-files-and-directories.md): Use Language Integrated Query (LINQ) for file system operations that don't to change the contents of the files or folders.
- [Use LINQ to query strings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/linq/how-to-query-strings.md): You can query a string as a sequence of characters in LINQ. This article contains several examples you can use or modify to suit your needs.
- [Language Integrated Query (LINQ)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/linq/index.md): Introduces Language Integrated Query (LINQ) in C#.

## Subtopics

- [Get Started Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/linq/get-started/llms.txt): 6 topics; Get Started Docs documentation and reference.
- [Standard query operators overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/linq/standard-query-operators/llms.txt): 10 topics; Standard query operators overview documentation and reference.
